mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.serial AS serial,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.type_id AS typeId,A.type_code AS typeCode,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.dict_code AS dictCode,A.order_id AS orderId,A.goods_type AS goodsType,A.goods_from AS goodsFrom,A.goods_id AS goodsId,A.goods_name AS goodsName,A.goods_sn AS goodsSn,A.goods_number AS goodsNumber,A.market_price AS marketPrice,A.shop_price AS shopPrice,A.total_price AS totalPrice,A.postage_fee AS postageFee,A.goods_attr AS goodsAttr,A.send_flag AS sendFlag,A.is_real AS isReal,A.extension_code AS extensionCode,A.parent_id AS parentId,A.is_gift AS isGift,A.promote_user_id AS promoteUserId,A.promote_username AS promoteUsername,A.promote_benifit_money AS promoteBenifitMoney,A.scans AS scans,A.hits AS hits,A.link_type AS linkType,A.link_id AS linkId,A.owner_id AS ownerId,A.owner_ids AS ownerIds,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy

sql.if:
,IF(A.goods_number IS NULL,1,A.goods_number) * A.shop_price AS totalMoney, oi.user_id AS userId, oi.username,
oi.express_order AS expressOrder, oi.poll_status AS pollStatus, oi.express_status AS expressStatus, oi.express_state AS expressState, oi.express_json AS expressJson, oi.express_receive_time AS expressReceiveTime, gp.pic_path as picPath, e.brief_name AS expressName, g.shop_id AS shopId, g.goods_name AS goodsName, u.username AS buyer, u2.username AS promoteUserName, s.name AS shopName, su.id AS shopUserId, su.username AS shopUsername
AND oi.shipping_status IN (1,2,3,4) AND oi.order_status IN (1,2,5) AND oi.pay_status IN (1,2,3)
AND (oi.express_state IS NULL OR oi.express_state = 0 OR oi.express_state = 1 OR oi.express_state = 2 OR oi.express_state = 5)

LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON A.order_id = oi.id LEFT JOIN express e ON oi.express_id = e.id LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = oi.user_id LEFT JOIN goods_picture gp ON A.goods_id = gp.goods_id AND gp.is_cover = 2 LEFT JOIN goods g ON A.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN shop s ON s.id = g.shop_id LEFT JOIN user su ON su.id = s.user_id LEFT JOIN wholesale w ON w.id = g.shop_id LEFT JOIN user u2 ON u2.serial = A.promote_username

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
mapper.update:
UPDATE
serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, main_status = #{mainStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, logic_status = #{logicStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted_by = #{deletedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, grade_id = #{gradeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dict_code = #{dictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_from = #{goodsFrom,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_sn = #{goodsSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_number = #{goodsNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, market_price = #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shop_price = #{shopPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, postage_fee = #{postageFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, goods_attr = #{goodsAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_flag = #{sendFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_real = #{isReal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, extension_code = #{extensionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_gift = #{isGift,jdbcType=INTEGER}, promote_user_id = #{promoteUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, promote_username = #{promoteUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, promote_benifit_money = #{promoteBenifitMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, scans = #{scans,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hits = #{hits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, link_type = #{linkType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, link_id = #{linkId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, owner_ids = #{ownerIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attr_str = #{attrStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attr_str2 = #{attrStr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attr_int = #{attrInt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attr_int2 = #{attrInt2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sequence = #{sequence,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

WHERE id IN( ${ids} )

UPDATE

WHERE id IN( ${ids} )
